testcase.classname: Get details of trending movies on BookMyShow and share it over whatsapp
testcase.name: Open BookMyshow get the treding movie with user view details and share it over whatsapp
testcase.system-out: Given User launch browser...................................................passed Then User goes to url "https://in.bookmyshow.com/explore/home/bengaluru"....passed Then User select location of his/her choice.................................passed Then User will see the details of trending movies...........................passed Then User get the details of it share it to certain whatspp contacts "psaurav1396@gmail.com".passed
